description:
Mend your broken heart now using NLP and self hypnosis techniques helps you overcome broken relationships and marriage using simple and powerful NLP and self hypnosis techniques . It will help you come out of the dreadful past and live your life in the present and prepare better for the future .

It will help you forget your ex with whom you were full attached and help you start a new relationship. Due to broken relationships and marriage , people lose focus in life and are not able to give their 100% in whatever they do. This course helps you to reprogram your mind after a broken relationship and live happily.

This Course Includes-

Lecture 1: Introduction to the course

Lecture 2 : Exercise on Past Relationships - Associated and Disassociated Pictures

Lecture 3 : Exercise to forget your Ex Husband / Lover

Lecture 4: Exercise on forgetting bad experiences with your Ex

Lecture 5: Creating trigger to become more calm and patient

Lecture 6 : Powerful Exercise to come out of love hypnosis

Lecture 7 : Exercise to bring back self esteem and confidence

Lecture 8 : Summary
title: Mend Your Broken Heart Now Using NLP
